biotools.summary: Compendium of more than 100 programs that focus on bacterial genome analysis. Included are programs for identification of binding sites, analysis of codons and prediction of expression levels, analysis of nucleotide composition bias and visualization of genomic information.

bioschemas.name: G-language GAE
